messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Evil Overlords
messages.msgSnippet: ... In the movie Dogma (one of my current favorites) the bad guy actually says something like I m not telling you my plan - I ve seen too many Bond movies.
messages.messageBody:
psam ordener wrote:
>
> Have you ever noticed how stupid the bad guys are in movies and video games?
> Like, they have to stop and chat with James Bond and let him see everything
> they're doing before they kill him?
>
In the movie Dogma (one of my current favorites) the bad guy actually says
something like "I'm not telling you my plan - I've seen too many Bond movies."
(This is after he's captured all the people trying to stop his plan.)
I find a number of the lines in there to be great ones!

--

Cindy Ferguson
crma@...

messages.subject: Evil Overlords
messages.msgSnippet: My son showed me this site - it s hysterical!  I expect some of you and your children will enjoy it too. Have you ever noticed how stupid the bad guys are in
messages.messageBody:
My son showed me this site - it's hysterical! I expect some of you and your
children will enjoy it too.

Have you ever noticed how stupid the bad guys are in movies and video games?
Like, they have to stop and chat with James Bond and let him see everything
they're doing before they kill him?

Learn how to be a *real* Evil Overlord:

http://www.eviloverlord.com/lists/overlord.html

psam
psamo@...

Motherhood - not just a job, it's an Adventure!
